Posts.EditableText: Hi I am new to this and was wondering how do I edit the inventory window, for instance with the wear command having (wearing) appear.
Posts.HTML: Hi I am new to this and was wondering how do I edit the inventory window, for instance with the wear command having (wearing) appear.

Posts.EditableText: There is a library for wearing clothing http://quest5.net/wiki/Clothing_Library
Posts.HTML: There is a library for wearing clothing http://quest5.net/wiki/Clothing_Library

Posts.EditableText:
Alternatively, you can change the object alias with a script command. You can use the "set variable or attribute" command to, for example, set:

[code:2f4ky00w]
socks.alias = "Socks (worn)"
[/code:2f4ky00w]
Posts.HTML:
Alternatively, you can change the object alias with a script command. You can use the "set variable or attribute" command to, for example, set:


socks.alias = "Socks (worn)"
